item.title: Repositório com cara lavada
item.description: O meu repositório de software para Arch Linux e distribuições compatíveis levou umas alterações cosméticas

item.title: Status on userrepository changes
item.description: It took me a while to update you about the latest changes to my Arch and Arch-compatible Linux distributions repository. But first, let me apologize for the delay: work, personal life and, for about 3 weeks now, a horrible back pain (that just doesn’t stop, even with an handful of medication) have kept me from doing this in the time frame I expected. First on the “agenda”, I experimented with increasing the zstd compression level for the packages like I said I would do in my last post about the repository.
